Articles.Content:
Happened pretty much the moment I booted up 1.1.0. Squeaky clean install, just started playing in sandbox. Happened in career too.

Affects VAB flag and flagpole flags but not Kerbal planted flags or the flags on the side of vessels.

They look like this:

System Specs

OSX El Capitan V 10.11.2

MacBook Pro (Retina, 13-inch, Late 2013)

Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i5

Graphics: Intel Iris 1536 MB
Posted this in the Linux thread. Not sure what platform you're on, but I can confirm this issue is on Linux.
